text:
Mr. William G. Harley
Page Two
August 4, 1959
I STILL HAVE NOT BEEN ABLE TO PIN YOU OR HULL DOWN ON
THE PROPOSED WISCONSIN MEETING PRIOR TO THE MANAGERS WORKSHOP.
Iâ€™d LIKE TO BRING MY FAMILY, NOT ONLY FOR THIS PRE-MEETING
BUT ALSO TO LET THEM KICK AROUND MADISON DURING THE LARGER
MEETING. ANY SUGGESTIONS REGARDING HOUSING, PREFERABLY NEAR
THE LAKE, WOULD BE GREATLY APPRECIATED.
TTames S. Miles
DI RECTOR
WBAA Radio - TV Unit
JSMs VML
